metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28154 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Webpack 5 before 5.76.0 does not avoid cross-realm object access.ImportParserPlugin.js mishandles the magic comment feature. An attacker whocontrols a property of an untrusted object can obtain access to the realglobal object.

criterions.comment: node-webpack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
